definitions.body: abs. [[עָתִיד לַכִּידוֹר]] Job 15:24 a king ready for the onset; pl. [[עֲתִדִים לַיּוֹם]] Es 3:14 ready for the day, so Es 8:13 Qr (Kt [[עתודים]]).
ready = skilled [[הָעֲתִידִים עׂרֵר]] Job 3:8 those skilled in rousing Leviathan.
prepared = impending (cf. NH= future), fpl. [[וְחָשׁ עֲתִדׂת]] De 32:35 the impending things are hastening (‖[[קָרוֹב יוֹם אֵידָם]]).
prepared = stored up, [[ועתידתיהם]] Is 10:13 Kt (Qr [[וַעֲתוּדׂתַיהֶם]], to differentiate it from above) and their stores have I plundered.
